summary.span: 定義 控制項中資料項目與其所繫結之節點之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目包含多個欄位 （例如具有數個屬性的 XML 項目） 時，節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目，根據預設的方法。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default. 在 XML 項目，節點會顯示項目名稱，顯示的樹狀目錄中，基礎結構，但沒有很有幫助。In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點的屬性繫結至特定的欄位。You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings. A物件會定義每個資料項目及它所繫結至的節點之間的關聯性。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to. 控制存放區及其中的物件屬性及套用繫結至資料來源建立樹狀階層和資料來源階層之間的一對一關聯性。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 在資料來源中，每個資料項目控制會嘗試比對資料項目若要建立對應的物件物件。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object in order to create the corresponding object. 建立時物件時，您必須指定繫結的準則。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 條件指出當資料項目應該繫結至節點。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定或屬性或這兩個屬性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 沒有同時指定這兩者的些微的效能。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound. 例如，下列宣告繫結`Name`並`ID`的資料來源欄位和屬性，分別的所有節點的深度為 0:For example, the following declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 資料成員指定基礎資料來源中資料項目的類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 每個資料來源中的項目的階層式資料 (由介面) 會公開屬性，指定資料的項目類型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a interface) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 項目的資料成員會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 當資料來源包含多個資料的項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪項資料的項目類型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 下列宣告繫結``的項目控制項樹狀結構中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 一旦建立繫結準則之後，您可以再繫結的屬性值可以繫結的物件。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 當繫結至靜態值，所有物件的物件套用共用相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫中的繫結的屬性藉由直接在節點中設定的對應屬性的物件。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node. 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結資料項目的欄位物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||若要繫結至欄位屬性物件。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出的屬性類別可讓您將屬性繫結成靜態值的物件。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要繫結至的靜態值屬性物件。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果發生衝突會定義物件，控制項會套用樹狀節點繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定義，並比對的深度和資料成員的物件。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 定義而且符合資料成員的物件。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 物件，定義並比對只的深度。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. （這種類型的樹狀節點繫結會套用至樹狀目錄中的所有節點）。(This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5. 物件資料來源中沒有相符項目。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在此情況下，所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的方法則繫結到並的節點屬性物件套用。In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the nodes to which the object is applied. 類別也可讓您藉由設定節點中顯示的文字格式化屬性。The class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the property. ## Examples 下表顯示一些範例樹狀節點繫結宣告。The following table shows some example tree node binding declarations. |範例繫結Example binding|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |``|繫結並樹狀目錄中的所有節點的屬性`Title`和`ID`分別欄位的資料來源。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data source, respectively. 所有節點都使用這個樹狀節點繫結宣告，因為和沒有設定的屬性。All nodes use this tree node binding declaration because the and properties are not set.| |``|繫結並樹狀結構中的所有節點的屬性`Title`並`ID`的欄位`Book`資料中的項目資料來源，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|繫結並屬性的所有節點的樹狀結構中的 2 深度`Title`和`ID`資料欄位的項目在資料來源中，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the data item in the data source, respectively.| |``|繫結及屬性的所有節點的深度為樹狀結構中的 2`Title`並`ID`的欄位`Book`資料中的項目資料來源，分別。Binds the and properties of all nodes with a depth of 2 in the tree to the `Title` and `ID` fields of the `Book` data item in the data source, respectively. 也會繫結成靜態值節點的屬性。Also binds the property of the nodes to a static value.| 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用物件以宣告方式來定義的節點，以及資料的項目之間的關聯性。The first code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式來定義的節點，以及資料的項目之間的關聯性的物件。The second code example demonstrates how to use objects programmatically to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 第三個程式碼範例會提供第一個和第二個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The third code example provides sample XML data for the first and second code examples. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件以宣告方式來定義的節點，以及資料的項目之間的關聯性。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects declaratively to define the relationship between a node and a data item. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must value.span: 要和資料項目之 屬性比對的值，以判斷是否要套用樹狀節點繫結。

span.span: The value to match against a data item's property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 資料成員指定基礎資料來源中資料項目的類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 每個資料來源中的項目的階層式資料 (由物件) 會公開屬性，指定資料的項目類型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 項目的資料成員會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 當資料來源包含多個資料的項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪項資料的項目類型使用。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 下列宣告繫結``的項目控制項樹狀結構中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 建立時物件時，您必須指定繫結的準則。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 條件指出當資料項目應該繫結至節點。The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node. 您可以指定或屬性或這兩個屬性。You can specify the or property, or both properties. 沒有同時指定這兩者的些微的效能。There is a slight performance gain by specifying both. 一旦建立繫結準則之後，您可以再繫結的屬性值可以繫結的物件。Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 當繫結至靜態值，所有物件的物件套用共用相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定繫結至節點的 XML 項目。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定繫結至節點的 XML 項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which XML element to bind to a node. 例如此程式碼才能正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this code example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. summary.span: 取得或設定字串，指定套用 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式化字串，指定套用 物件之節點文字的顯示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性用來提供自訂格式的節點的文字。The property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text. 資料格式字串包含兩個部分，以分隔，在表單中的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，格式化字串`{0:F2}`會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號表示格式字串而不是常值的字串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 這個值可以設定只為 0，因為每個節點中只有一個值。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node. 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定值的顯示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出常見的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字元Format character|中會顯示數值Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|貨幣格式。Currency format.| |`D`|十進位格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科學記號 （指數） 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定的格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|一般格式。General format.| |`N`|數字格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六進位格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除了`X`，格式字元不區分大小寫。Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive. `X`格式字元會顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 如需格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化類型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 節點旁顯示映像時，當滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，會顯示工具提示文字。When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用屬性，將相同的工具提示文字結合至每個節點映像中，您可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定繫結至自訂映像屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 映像的節點旁會顯示，並可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等等），只要用戶端瀏覽器支援該格式。The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 您可以設定連線，覆寫個別節點的映像及其直接屬性。You can override the image for an individual node by setting its property directly. 不使用這個屬性繫結至每個節點的相同映像，您可以繫結的屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using this property to bind the same image to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 當顯示影像使用的節點旁屬性，您應該考慮設定屬性。When displaying an image next to a node with the property, you should also consider setting the property. 您指定的工具提示文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，將套用在特定節點深度的物件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to apply a object at a specific node depth. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定之節點的自訂映像物件套用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image for a node to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Booklist.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定欄位名稱，繫結至屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 當屬性設定，控制項顯示之文字的節點，而不是純文字的超連結。When the property is set, the control displays a hyperlink for the text of the node, instead of plain text. 您可以選擇性地設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，其中顯示連結的內容。You can also optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用要繫結屬性屬性物件欄位中，您可以設定屬性設定為固定值屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can set the property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定或屬性或這兩個屬性，才可以將繫結至適當的欄位。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些屬性要繫結至 XML 項目的屬性物件物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些屬性要繫結至 XML 項目的屬性物件物件套用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Booklist.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 某些情況下，它並不實際靜態預先定義的資料大小或取決於使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因為這個緣故，控制項支援動態的節點數。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 當屬性設定為`true`，節點的子節點，物件套用至取得在執行階段節點展開時填入。When the property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded. 當資料繫結藉由設定的來控制`true`，建立繫結都有屬性設定為`true`。When data bindings are created by setting the of the control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the property set to `true`. 以宣告方式建立資料繫結都有屬性設定為`false`。Data bindings that are created declaratively have the property set to `false`. 使用宣告式語法，可讓您控制個別的資料繫結的行為。Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings. > [!NOTE] > 不同於的屬性類別屬性不需要定義的事件處理方法事件，如果您正在使用資料來源控制項，例如。Unlike the property of the class, the property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the event, if you are using a data source control, such as . 相反地，控制項以動態方式產生的事件處理方法，使用的屬性中的物件集合。Instead, the control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the objects in the collection. 您仍然可以定義的事件處理方法事件; 不過，它會呼叫之後的事件處理方法控制項。You can still define an event-handling method for the event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the control. 支援的瀏覽器也可以利用用戶端節點數。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 啟用時，這可讓填入動態用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這樣就不需要回傳給伺服器控制項。When enabled, this allows the control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server. 如需有關用戶端節點數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on client-side node population, see . 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點是否顯示核取方塊。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點是否顯示核取方塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/CS/treenodebindingpopulateondemandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingPopulateOnDemand/VB/treenodebindingpopulateondemandvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供上述的程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```

## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來指定選取的節點時引發的事件。The property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 下表列出可用的選項。The following table lists the available options. |`SelectAction` 值`SelectAction` value|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切換展開或摺疊的節點。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 會引發事件或事件，視需要。Raises the event or the event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|選取節點時，不引發任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|選取節點時，引發 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|選取節點時，引發 和 事件。Raises both the and events when a node is selected. 只會展開節點，而不會摺疊。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 則不會呈現與節點及其屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定當按一下節點時，會引發的事件。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定當按一下節點時，會引發的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. ## Remarks 多節點的選取項目中提供支援控制項，您可以在節點中顯示映像旁邊的核取方塊。To provide multinode selection support in the control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node. 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來顯示或隱藏節點的核取方塊。The property is used to show or hide the check box for a node. > [!NOTE] > 雖然屬性可以用來顯示核取方塊，若要使用較常見屬性控制項。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 不過，屬性會影響每個節點類型所指定的屬性; 因此，屬性通常用來覆寫該設定的節點物件套用。However, the property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the object is applied. 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點是否顯示核取方塊。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點是否顯示核取方塊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a check box is displayed for a node. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. remarks.format:
## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來指定的視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容，會連結至節點上，按一下該節點時。The property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性會覆寫屬性控制項的節點物件套用。Setting the property overrides the property of the control for the nodes to which the object is applied. 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性上`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未設定屬性，如果轉譯的輸出，如控制項必須符合規範的 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property, if the rendered output for the control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，您應該避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB: ASP.NET 協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定應該在新視窗中顯示的根節點相關聯的網頁。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定應該在新視窗中顯示的根節點相關聯的網頁。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the Web page that is associated with the root node should be displayed in a new window. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Book.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeBindingTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingTarget/CS/treenodebindingtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeBindingTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeBindingTarget/VB/treenodebindingtargetvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例會提供上述的程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The following code example provides sample XML data for the preceding code example. ```
```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定欄位來自資料來源之欄位的名稱，以繫結至套用 物件之 物件的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied.

value.span: 要繫結至已經套用 物件之 物件的 屬性的欄位名稱。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定欄位名稱，繫結至屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 屬性用來指定的視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容，會連結至節點上，按一下該節點時。The property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用要繫結屬性屬性物件欄位中，您可以設定屬性設定為固定值屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to a field, you can set property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定或屬性或這兩個屬性，才可以將繫結至適當的欄位。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定為套用 物件之節點顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 為套用 物件的節點所顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed for the node to which the object is applied.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來指定在節點中顯示的文字。The property is used to specify the text displayed in a node. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用屬性，以將相同的文字繫結至每個節點中，您可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示之節點的值物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value to display for a node to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示之節點的值物件套用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the value to display for a node to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Booklist.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性指定繫結至值屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來補充屬性所儲存之節點相關聯的任何其他資料物件套用。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不會顯示在控制項，通常用來儲存資料，來處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用屬性，以相同的值繫結至每個節點中，您可以繫結屬性藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來儲存之節點的相關補充資料物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to store supplemental data about a node to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來儲存之節點的相關補充資料物件套用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to store supplemental data about a node to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Booklist.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項繫結至資料來源，請使用屬性來指定欄位名稱，繫結至屬性物件。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the field name to bind to the property of a object. 此繫結關聯性會影響所有物件的物件套用。This binding relationship affects all objects to which the object is applied. 屬性用來補充屬性所儲存之節點相關聯的任何其他資料物件套用。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the object is applied. 此值不會顯示在控制項，通常用來儲存資料，來處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫屬性，藉由設定直接每個節點的屬性。You can selectively override the property by setting the property of each node directly. 而不是使用要繫結屬性屬性物件欄位中，您可以設定屬性設定為固定值屬性。Instead of using the property to bind the property of a object to an field, you can set the property to a fixed value by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定或屬性或這兩個屬性，才可以將繫結至適當的欄位。If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the or property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些屬性要繫結至 XML 項目的屬性物件物件套用。The first code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 第二個程式碼範例會提供第一個程式碼範例中的範例 XML 資料。The second code example provides sample XML data for the first code example. 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定哪些屬性要繫結至 XML 項目的屬性物件物件套用。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which attribute of an XML element to bind to the property of a object to which the object is applied. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製此程式碼範例中，名為 Booklist.xml 之後提供的範例 XML 資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data, provided after this code example, to a file named Booklist.xml.
